'''A Tour of Wonders''' is a part of the [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!]] event in [[Version 3.7]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Duel! The Summoners' Summit! A Tour of Wonders 1.png
|text1  = In "A Tour of Wonders," you must complete challenges and claim stamps at Scenic Checkpoints. {{Color|help|Once you have completed said challenges and obtained the stamps}}, you can obtain the corresponding rewards."
}}

==Stages==
===Scenic Tour: Dawn Winery===
Unlocks 2023-05-25 10{{Colon}}00

;Sightseeing Goals
* Complete Scenic Tour: Dawn Winery
* Claim the stamp at Scenic Tour: Dawn Winery's Scenic Checkpoint

;Rewards
Complete all Sightseeing Goals to obtain:<br>{{Card|Primogem|60}}{{Card|Invokation Coupons|300}}{{Card|Guide to Freedom|2}}{{Card|Guide to Resistance|2}}{{Card|Guide to Ballad|2}}

===Security Tour: Stonehide Encounter===
Unlocks 2023-05-27 04{{Colon}}00

;Sightseeing Goals
* Complete Security Tour: Stonehide Encounter
* Claim the stamp at Security Tour: Stonehide Encounter's Scenic Checkpoint

Time Limit: 3 minutes

;Opponents
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Geo Samachurl*1;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter*1;Rock Shield Hilichurl Guard*1;Hilichurl Fighter*2}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl*2}}
* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl*1;Geo Samachurl*1}}

;Rewards
Complete all Sightseeing Goals to obtain:<br>{{Card|Primogem|60}}{{Card|Invokation Coupons|300}}{{Card|Guide to Prosperity|2}}{{Card|Guide to Diligence|2}}{{Card|Guide to Gold|2}}

===Scenic Tour: Grand Narukami Shrine===
Unlocks 2023-05-29 04{{Colon}}00

;Sightseeing Goals
* Complete Scenic Tour: Grand Narukami Shrine
* Claim the stamp at Scenic Tour: Grand Narukami Shrine's Scenic Checkpoint

Time Limit: 2 minutes

;Rewards
Complete all Sightseeing Goals to obtain:<br>{{Card|Primogem|60}}{{Card|Invokation Coupons|300}}{{Card|Guide to Transience|2}}{{Card|Guide to Elegance|2}}{{Card|Guide to Light|2}}

===Security Tour: Shroom Danger===
Unlocks 2023-05-31 04{{Colon}}00

;Location
* [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Sumeru]]

;Sightseeing Goals
* Complete Security Tour: Shroom Danger
* Claim the stamp at Security Tour: Shroom Danger's Scenic Checkpoint

Time Limit: 3 minutes

;Opponents
* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Stretchy Pyro Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus*2}}
* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Grounded Hydroshroom*1;Grounded Geoshroom*1;Floating Dendro Fungus*2}}
* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Grounded Hydroshroom*1;Winged Cryoshroom*1;Winged Dendroshroom*1}}

;Rewards
Complete all Sightseeing Goals to obtain:<br>{{Card|Primogem|60}}{{Card|Invokation Coupons|300}}{{Card|Guide to Admonition|2}}{{Card|Guide to Ingenuity|2}}{{Card|Guide to Praxis|2}}
